column4: thanks guys.... I've just been able to play a DVD and I'm fully aware of the Multiverse and UNiverse... thanks for the help guys... I don't think I'll ever need to use a windows machine for the rest of my life...
Guys when I'm playing a video DVD ... the playback is a little jumpy this was not the case in Windows.. can anyone help I'm using totem
try enabling DMA for your device (man hdparm) and also try using VLC media player it is better
first of all stop that, second of all /dev/hda is your hard drive not your dvdrom drive
